item.title: Mentioned by Mississauga
item.description:
Port Credit marina becomes home to 10000 baby salmon
Photographers lined the jetties like paparazzi on a red carpet as Finance Minister Charles Sousa, Mississauga-South MP Stella Ambler and Ward 1 Councillor Jim Tovey ceremonially tipped the first bucket of fish into a cage submerged in the icy water.
